resources.string: This is another activity sarting by main activity

Welcome to Taxosearch location based augmented reality quiz game- just to realize how much you are expertise in plant identification and Internet searching. The quiz is based on tree/plant species in SACON campus. By keen observation on the tree species in the field with offline wikipedia information, you are challenged to clear the quiz, good luck. If this is the first time playing you should go to the "Settings" option to decide which difficulty setting you think you can master.
